 Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd.

Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. 

Engineering Consultant

Open Position

Company Description

Pranjal Projects Pvt Ltd was originally founded as a partnership firm in 1980 by H.C. Bhatia and was incorporated as a private limited company in 2002. It is now promoted by H.C. Bhatia and his sons, Vikas and Deepak Bhatia. The company is an Indian infrastructure and fabrication firm specializing in structural steel solutions for a diverse range of industries.

Established date

While the company was founded as a partnership firm in 1980, it was formally incorporated as Pranjal Projects Private Limited on May 13, 2002. [...] Company profile: Pranjal Projects provides a range of services, including sheet metal fabrication, pre-engineered buildings (PEB), and heavy engineering fabrication.
 Key products and services:
  + Structural steel solutions for infrastructure projects like steel bridges and railway stations.
  + Fabricated components for earth-moving equipment and heavy machinery.
  + Heavy engineering equipment, including boilers, pressure vessels, and storage tanks for industries such as oil, gas, and power.
  + Various steel products like TMT bars, plates, and beams. [...] Certification and technology: The company is an ISO-certified firm that uses advanced technology, such as robotic and laser-guided welding, and adheres to OHSAS safety practices. It is also an approved provider for railways and bridges by the Research Designs and Standards Organisation (RDSO).

Mark R.   8h [...] The AI career rules just changed while you were on holiday. 4 models dropped in 25 days. GPT-5.2. Claude Opus 4.5. Gemini 3. Grok 4.1. Most people scrolled past. "Cool. Another model." Those people are about to get left behind. Here's what the data says: ‚Üí 95% of enterprise AI projects are FAILING to deliver ROI (MIT) ‚Üí 42% of companies abandoned AI initiatives entirely in 2025 ‚Üí But workers with AI skills command a 56% wage premium (PwC) ‚Üí 50% of tech job postings now require AI skills The gap between people who get it and people who don't is widening. Fast.
